solution_line_template: If the {burger_students} students who ordered burgers were twice the number of students who ordered hot dogs, then {burger_students}/{twice_factor} = <<{burger_students}/{twice_factor}={hot_dog_students}>>{hot_dog_students} students ordered hot dogs.
The total number of students is {hot_dog_students} + {burger_students} = <<{hot_dog_students}+{burger_students}={total_students}>>{total_students}
